headline.main: $2,700 for Hillary Clinton at ‘Hamilton’? That Would Be Enough

snippet: A benefit performance of the hit musical raised money for Mrs. Clinton’s campaign — and featured speeches by the presumptive nominee and Lin-Manuel Miranda, the show’s creator and former star....
lead_paragraph: A benefit performance of the hit musical raised money for Mrs. Clinton’s campaign — and featured speeches by the presumptive nominee and Lin-Manuel Miranda, the show’s creator and former star.
